titleStmt.title: A brief declaration of those that have accepted the trust of receiving and distributing such sums of money as wel-affected persons shall subscribe towards the maintenance of hopeful students at both the universities, for the speedy supply of the Church of God in England with godly and able ministers. Together with rules which they among themselves have agreed to observe therein; and some motives to incite well-affected persons to be assistant thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Wollaston, John, Sir.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end by the trustees, beginning with the name of the Lord Mayor, Sir John Wollaston.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
